txt.en: 'Good day to you, [placeholder]! Here for the festival, are you? Well, as you may know, our main event is the Taste of Hobbiton! It's a combination race and eating contest.\n\n'In the end, only one hobbit will have the endurance and pluck needed to roll across the finish line first! Pick a likely looking contestant and let's see if you've got an eye to spot the winner!'
Speak to Bando Brandybuck to choose a race contestant
Speak to Bando Brandybuck and choose your favourite contestant for the next upcoming race.
The Taste of Hobbiton is in full swing! Bondo Brandybuck is accepting wagers on which hobbit is most likely to win.
Do not leave the race area
You have left the race area
Observe the race and cheer for your chosen participant.
Watch the race to see if your contestant will win
Wait for the race to begin
